title: The Lady Bushranger : The life of Elizabeth Jessie Hickman
description: The Lady Bushranger, Elizabeth Jessie Hickman, nee Martini, nee Hunt, had been hidden in the deep valleys of Wollemi but now the full story of her circus career, cattle duffing, escape from the police and final taming are told by Pat Studdy-Clift. This is a historic novel thoroughly researched and fully based on fact.Pat Studdy-Clift is a NSW writer with a particular interest in bush life. This is her sixth book.
author: Pat Studdy-Clift
